post.body: Just learning how to wk this @ replies. Haaaa! We need to visit. Merry Christmas, my friend!
I forgot you moved further west. Different mtn range now. Merry Christmas to you and Mrs. GC and the boys!
<----Beautiful! Thanks for sharing, Miss A! Merry Christmas! ~Ronald
<------Thanks and ditto! ~Ronald
<---------Aweeeeeeee! So go eat now. Haaaaaaaa!
<-----I think they'll win this weekend but Lord knows after that.
<-------Snow in the Rocks. Does it get any better, Mr. DC? Merry Christmas!
<-------Amen to that, Mr. J! Thanks for the reminder. ~Ronald
<-----Amen. You're welcome and ditto, Mr. CC! ~Ronald
<------Thanks and ditto. Have fun!
<------Famous dude!
<----Jose' F in the mix? Have fun and be safe. Merry Christmas! ~Ronald
<------Have fun and be safe! Merry Christmas!
<----Gingerbread. Yummy! Have fun and be safe! ~Ronald
<---I'm "fooled" on how they come to the conclusion that we are so gullible.
<----Never gonna die. I'm gonna live FOREVER!
"Christmas waves a magic wand over this world, and behold, everything is softer and more beautiful." ~N. Peale
Merry Christmas! my Twitter & Facebook friends. I'm honored & proud to know ya. Remember, no matter the question, LOVE is the answer! Ronald
Thanks for the follow, Mr. A. Merry Christmas!
Merry Christmas to all my Twitter and Facebook friends! It's an honor and privilege to be your friend. ~Ronald
